short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hides whitespace changes in GitHub pull requests for specified repositories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically hides whitespace changes in GitHub pull requests for specified repositories. This extension works on file changed and commits pages.
Repositories can be configured individually.
Open source: https://github.com/uewtwo/hide-whitespace-on-github-pr
